description:
PIMS 2028 BD FSP: Bot Wetlands

Building Local Capacity for Conservation and Sustainable Use of Biodiversity in the Okavango Delta

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: The BIOKAVANGO Project is a five-year project, ending in 2011. It is funded by the Global Environment Facility GEF), the Botswana Government, the tourism private sector and non-governmental donors, and is implemented through the Harry Oppenheimer Okavang
subproject.title: Sustainable Use of BD in Okav

title: Sustainable Use of Biodiversity in Okavango Delta
